title: This role can spawn in game 40

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - At the start of each night, you may use the ability of a randomly chosen role from game 40. This resolves at the start of the night because I worded it wrong but I don't want to change it.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Make the same faction win as in game 40. If that faction isn't in the game, eliminate all who would oppose you and also you get Basic defense. Hahaha I'm putting attributes in the goal bitch!
